author: ehu
msg: * COMMITTERS: Make i10n doc section names consistent.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix slow "svn st" where the targets are files by not locking the whole anchor
* libsvn_client/status.c (svn_client_status): Don't lock the whole directory

author: rooneg
msg: Fix a bug that caused 'svnversion --version .' to crash.
(svn_opt_print_help): don't bother trying to print subcommand help if we
don't actually have a command table, as is the case in svnversion.
Reported By:  Manuel Arias <manuel.arias at gmail.com>

msg: Book Spanish. Updated build instructions specifying correct xsl
